001package gbw.melange.common.shading.components;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Mesh;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
005import gbw.melange.common.errors.Error;
006
007/**
008 * An AtomicShader is not the most performant shader abstraction ever, but highly flexible.
009 * Consider using specializations for specific purposes
010 */
011public interface IAtomicShader {
012    /**
013     * Set the vertex shader, detach the old one and replace and relink.
014     * If the new one hasn't been compiled yet, it will be and any error returned.
015     *
016     * @param vertex         the new vertex shader to couple
017     * @param deleteExisting if one was already provided, delete it.
018     * @return an error describing what went wrong or {@link Error#NONE}
019     */
020    Error setVertex(IVertexShader vertex, boolean deleteExisting);
021
022    /**
023     * See {@link IAtomicShader#setVertex(IVertexShader, boolean)}
024     */
025    Error setFragment(IFragmentShader fragment, boolean deleteExisting);
026
027    /**
028     * See {@link IAtomicShader#setVertex(IVertexShader, boolean)}
029     */
030    Error setGeometry(IGeometryShader geometry, boolean deleteExisting);
031
032    /**
033     * Regardless of the amount of shaders present, all available will be rendered in the order:
034     * Vertex -> Geometry -> Fragment to the mesh provided and with the matrix applied.
035     *
036     * @param mesh          non null
037     * @param appliedMatrix non null
038     */
039    void render(Mesh mesh, Matrix4 appliedMatrix);
040
041    /**
042     * Bind all resources currently available to this shader for manual use.
043     * You will absolutely mess up OpenGL if you change the components of this shader using {@link IAtomicShader#setFragment(IFragmentShader, boolean)},
044     * {@link IAtomicShader#setVertex(IVertexShader, boolean)} or {@link IAtomicShader#setGeometry(IGeometryShader, boolean)} while bound.
045     */
046    void bind();
047    /**
048     * Unbind all resources that might have been bound by manual use of this shader.
049     */
050    void unbind();
051}
